titlestmt.titleproper: John Wallace Tomasini pseudo-imperial card index, circa 1964
titlestmt.author: David Hill

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: John Wallace Tomasini pseudo-imperial card index
did.abstract: Card index with research relating to Visigothic pseudo-imperial coins.

scopecontent.head: Scope and content note
scopecontent.p: Card index with research relating to Visigothic pseudo-imperial coins. Relates to John Wallace Tomasini's The Barbaric Tremissis in Spain and Southern France: Anastsius to Leovigild, 1964.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
